long_description: Hanging out before the big game or after a day on the ski hill? Choose the SunCloud Tailgate polarized sunglasses for all your sun-filled hangouts. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Green stripe frames feature polarized gray lenses; burnished brown frames feature brown polarized lenses. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens(TM)SunCloud features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). SunCloud Tailgate polarized sunglasses are designed to fit medium size faces.
short_description: Hanging out before the big game or after a day on the ski hill? Choose the SunCloud Tailgate polarized sunglasses for all your sun-filled hangouts.
